title: 从复分析到量子化研讨会于2025.5.12-5.16举办
content: Organizing committee Dan Coman (Syracuse University) Bo Liu (East China Normal University) Xiaonan Ma (Nankai University) Weiping Zhang (Nankai University) Link of the updated information: https://math.ecnu.edu.cn/~bliu/FCATQ/index.html Registration: 10:00-20:00, May 12, 2025 Place: Jiayuan Hotel ( 南开大学嘉园宾馆 ) Nankai University, 94 Weijin Road, Tianjin, P.R. China Jiayuan Hotel Tel.: +86 22 2350 6281 Invited Speakers Masanori Adachi (Shizuoka University) Hugues Auvray* (Paris-Saclay University) Fabrizio Bianchi (University of Pisa) Junyan Cao (Université Côte d'Azur) Tien-Cuong Dinh (National University of Singapore) Alexander Drewitz (University of Cologne) Siarhei Finski (École Polytechnique) Hendrik Herrmann (University of Wuppertal) Chin-Yu Hsiao (Academia Sinica) Xiaojun Huang (Rutgers University) Cezar Joita (Romanian Academy) Semyon Klevtsov (Université de Strasbourg) Louis Ioos (Centre national de la recherche scientifique) Ngaiming Mok (The University of Hong Kong) Viêt-Anh Nguyên (University of Lille) Mihai Paun* (University of Bayreuth) Nikhil Savale (University of Cologne) Duc-Viet Vu (University of Cologne) Xiaowei Wang (Rutgers University) Xiangyu Zhou (Chinese Academy of Sciences) *=to be confirmed
